reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is in a fairly good location in district one and a not too busy street with many other 3 star hotels along it. Its quite a new hotel and has most of what you want - very modern furnishings, flat screen tv etc. There were a few disappointments however. We had a suite which was very small but had lots of natural light. There was no attachment for the shower over the bath (which was a spa bath) and that was annoying. Also the neon light was a bit annoying at night right outside the window. Breakfast was OK - a lot of asian style food but some western food also, omlette chef etc. Watch out which room you book as I suspect one or two may not have a window.
reviews.title: Another 3 star to consider in Ho Chi Minh
